channel.title: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
channel.description:
LIVE Sunday Nights at 8:30 EST, on ASPRN, Husband and wife team, Kris and Mike are your hosts.
Kris is a seasoned paranormal investigator and believes that ghosts exist due to some personal experiences she has had. Mike is new to paranormal investigating and has never had a paranormal experience which leaves him skeptic.
Kris and Mike provide an informative paranormal show with husband and wife wit.
Listen LIVE at http://www.cprshow.com or http://www.asprn.com
Crossroads Paranormal Radio is powered by the All Souls Paranormal Radio Network
channel.itunes:subtitle: Breathing Life into the Paranormal Community
channel.itunes:author: Crossroads Paranormal Radio

item.title: Episode 183 Jim Willis
item.description: Mr Jim "Weird" Willis was our guest on this the 3rd Anniversary of Crossroads Paranormal Radio. Jim has been one of our favorite guests over the years and always has great "Weird" stories to tell and tonight was no exception. Jim is the Co-Author of Weird Ohio and Weird Indiana as well as others.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Mr Jim "Weird" Willis was our guest on this the 3rd Anniversary of Crossroads Paranormal Radio. Jim has been one of our favorite guests over the years and always has great "Weird" stories to tell and tonight was no exception. Jim is the Co-Author of Weird Ohio and Weird Indiana as well as others.

item.title: Episode 182 Kris, Mike and Gregg
item.description: Our guest didn't show tonight so we had Gregg Cable of Midwest Paratalk Radio call in and join us. We talked about paranormal TV programs, conferences and more. We had a great time.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Our guest didn't show tonight so we had Gregg Cable of Midwest Paratalk Radio call in and join us. We talked about paranormal TV programs, conferences and more. We had a great time.

item.title: Episode 181 Joe and Tara of Visions Magazine
item.description: Visionsmagazineonline.com was an idea Tara had for years – to create a forum to find others that have had personal paranormal experiences themselves, but could not explain away or troubled them in some way, and share these findings based on back and forth conversation and research, and share that help and advice with others to gain insight, and perhaps get some help in some way for themselves personally. The original idea was to create a newsletter. Joe convinced Tara that a website will reach the world and within 2 1/2 years of working on Visions day and night, 7 days a week, two computer workstations and countless hours invested in writing and research of paranormal phenomenon, they are one of the most respected sources of Paranormal reporting today.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Visionsmagazineonline.com was an idea Tara had for years – to create a forum to find others that have had personal paranormal experiences themselves, but could not explain away or troubled them in some way, and share these findings based on back and forth conversation and research, and share that help and advice with others to gain insight, and perhaps get some help in some way for themselves personally. The original idea was to create a newsletter. Joe convinced Tara that a website will reach the world and within 2 1/2 years of working on Visions day and night, 7 days a week, two computer workstations and countless hours invested in writing and research of paranormal phenomenon, they are one of the most respected sources of Paranormal reporting today.

item.title: Episode 180 Paranormal Cops
item.description: "Paranormal Cops" follows a group of larger-than-life cops who walk one beat during the day as real-life Chicago-area police officers and another at night when they apply their forensic and investigative expertise to paranormal casework. Responding to the pleas of ordinary people who are victimized by distressing and inexplicable activities in their homes and workplaces, as well as taking cases from their day jobs when called upon, these cops bring their no-nonsense approach to hunting ghosts and real-life police skills to separate the fact from fiction and often happen upon results much scarier than the paranormal.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: "Paranormal Cops" follows a group of larger-than-life cops who walk one beat during the day as real-life Chicago-area police officers and another at night when they apply their forensic and investigative expertise to paranormal casework. Responding to the pleas of ordinary people who are victimized by distressing and inexplicable activities in their homes and workplaces, as well as taking cases from their day jobs when called upon, these cops bring their no-nonsense approach to hunting ghosts and real-life police skills to separate the fact from fiction and often happen upon results much scarier than the paranormal.

item.title: Episode 179 Linda Gunn
item.description: Linda is a Sensitive and has helped many people across the country with hauntings and malevolent spirits for the better part of her life. She is a third generation Sensitive, and has passed the ability on to her daughter, who is learning to fully use the gift. Linda uses her deep and personal spiritual beliefs to help her with her work in the paranormal field while balancing her time between her cases and being a devoted wife, mother, and grandmother. She is a wonderful and giving person who is always willing to help those in need.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Linda is a Sensitive and has helped many people across the country with hauntings and malevolent spirits for the better part of her life. She is a third generation Sensitive, and has passed the ability on to her daughter, who is learning to fully use the gift. Linda uses her deep and personal spiritual beliefs to help her with her work in the paranormal field while balancing her time between her cases and being a devoted wife, mother, and grandmother. She is a wonderful and giving person who is always willing to help those in need.

item.title: Episode 178 Buffi Becraft
item.description: Have you ever wondered about that odd hunky guy two houses over? The one with the big duelly that's black as sin? Does your neighbor work out with a friggin' big double-handed sword? While listening to heavy-metal music? Do you hear the small town gossip about that girl who's sweet, but lordy...don't go snooping around her house at midnight? You're liable to get chomped.*Buffi BeCraft writes romantic paranormal fantasy set against a small town Texas backdrop.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio

item.title: Episode 177 Rochelle Sparrow and Cortney Kane
item.description: Together…Rochelle will provide channeled messages while Cortney paints the energy from your aura and your physical body to help provide you with a direction for moving forward in your life. Ask your most important questions and receive clear, specific guidance.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Together…Rochelle will provide channeled messages while Cortney paints the energy from your aura and your physical body to help provide you with a direction for moving forward in your life. Ask your most important questions and receive clear, specific guidance.

item.title: Episode 176 Andre Frattino
item.description: Andre Frattino has been a freelance paranormal investigator since 2003, having participated in over 50 investigations between Florida and Georgia. Most recently he was contracted by the Rome Tribune Newpaper in Rome Georgia to lead an investigation into three never before explored haunted locations to be included in a documentary of Rome's history. Besides hunting for ghosts, Andre's main passion in life is illustration and storytelling. Andre has also served as a case manager for Pilgrim Film and Television (the production company for Ghost Hunters) for a new paranormal series to debute later this year. Andre joins us tonight to talk about the release of his graphic novel, Flagler's Few and the Reaper of Saint George Street, a comic where the heroes are actually ghost hunters!"
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Andre Frattino has been a freelance paranormal investigator since 2003, having participated in over 50 investigations between Florida and Georgia. item.title: Episode 175 Kris and Mike
item.description: Our guest didn't show up tonight so we talked about what we had going on paranormally. we took questions from the chat room and callers. Started out kind of slow because we were dead tired from a long weekend of filming but got better as it went along.

item.title: Episode 174 Chris and Katie of NESS
item.description:
We do not speculate or sensationalize, but rather approach each case from the position of scientific researchers. Our goal is to collect evidence, analyze it thoroughly and present our findings to the client in a clear and concise manner.
We are researchers above all other pursuits. We question not only “what”, but “why” and “how”. We aim to answer such questions through scientific experimentation and the gathering of observable data.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary:
We do not speculate or sensationalize, but rather approach each case from the position of scientific researchers. Our goal is to collect evidence, analyze it thoroughly and present our findings to the client in a clear and concise manner.
We are researchers above all other pursuits. We question not only “what”, but “why” and “how”. We aim to answer such questions through scientific experimentation and the gathering of observable data.

item.title: Episode 173 Dr Rita Louise
item.description: Dr. Rita Louise, PhD, ND is the founder of the Institute of Applied Energetics and the host of Just Energy Radio. A Naturopathic Physician and a 20-year veteran in the Human Potential Field, it is her unique gift as a medical intuitive and clairvoyant that illuminates and enlivens her work. Author of the books Avoiding The Cosmic 2X4, Dark Angels: An Insider's Guide To Ghosts, Spirits & Attached Entities and The Power Within, Dr. Louise credits early childhood influences for the direction her life would take.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Rita Louise, PhD, ND is the founder of the Institute of Applied Energetics and the host of Just Energy Radio. A Naturopathic Physician and a 20-year veteran in the Human Potential Field, it is her unique gift as a medical intuitive and clairvoyant that illuminates and enlivens her work. Author of the books Avoiding The Cosmic 2X4, Dark Angels: An Insider's Guide To Ghosts, Spirits & Attached Entities and The Power Within, Dr. Louise credits early childhood influences for the direction her life would take.

item.title: Episode 172 Bee Herz
item.description: Fantastic show. We had a great time talking with Psychic Medium Bee Herz. Bee was probably one of the most upbeat and bubbly guest we have had on in a long time. We talk with her about all aspects of Psychic abilities and the role she plays as a Psychic Medium.

item.title: Episode 171 Ericka Boussarane
item.description: Tonight we talked with International Psychic Medium Ericka Boussarane. We talked about her work with cold cases and how she got started. We talked about her three radio shows as well. She also did some awsome readings which pretty much blew everyone away with the responses. Great show.

item.title: Episode 170 Paranormal Chatter
item.description: Well something different from CPR tonight. Kris was sick and couldn't do the show, so Gregg Cable of Midwest Paratalk joined Mike for the show. Then the guest didn't show up. item.title: Episode 168 Justin Blair
item.description: Tonight we talked with Justin Blair who made a documentary about Transylvania. We talked with him about their beliefs in Vampires and many of there rituals. We learned a lot of the folklore surrounding these topics.

item.itunes:summary: Tonight we talked with Justin Blair who made a documentary about Transylvania. We talked with him about their beliefs in Vampires and many of there rituals. We learned a lot of the folklore surrounding these topics.

item.title: Episode 167 Live Show From Elwood Indiana
item.description: Tonight we broadcasted live from an event we were doing called Dining with Ghosts at the Elwood Opera House. We did our normal talk at the beginning of the show and then tuned into the speakers that were talking at the event.

item.title: Episode 166 Rick Hayes
item.description: Tonight we talked with our good friend Rick Hayes of LifesGift. Rick is a returning guest to CPR who is always a joy to talk with. We talk with him about is part in the film that will be debuting on the SyFy channel soon. Also is appearance at the upcoming Fright Fest in Watseka Illinois.

item.title: Episode 165 Keith Johnson
item.description: We had a great time talking with Keith Johnson tonight. Keith is very knowledgable in the field of Demonology. We not only talked about Demons but all aspects of the Paranormal.

item.itunes:summary: We had a great time talking with Keith Johnson tonight. Keith is very knowledgable in the field of Demonology. We not only talked about Demons but all aspects of the Paranormal.

item.title: Episode 164 Shawn B
item.description: Shawn B of S.P.O.O.K.S. was our guest tonight. We talked with him about his interest in Hell Hounds or as they are reffered in his area "Booger Hounds". And of course we talked about ghost and hauntings as well.

item.title: Episode 163 Paul Browning
item.description: We spoke with long time friend Paul Browning of Clarksville Ghost Hunters and author of "Thinking outside the Box" and "Haunting the Octogon Hall". Paul talked about thesse two books and about his investigating proceedures. We had a great time talking with Paul and think you will enjoy listening.

item.title: Episode 162 Shawn Sellers
item.description: Shawn Sellers is a sensitive and paranormal researcher that currently resides in Montgomery, AL. He was raised rather unconventionally by his grandmother who started to teach him about the spirit world at a young age. His grandmother was well-known locally for her abilities and she passed a great amount of her knowledge on to him. In addition to his grandmother's influence, he was also brought up in the world of Freemasonry.

item.title: Episode 160 Eddie Benitez
item.description: Returning to The CPR Show is Eddie Benitez, one of our favorite guests. We talked with Eddie about his upcoming new albumn and new book that he has coming out. We also talked about his music, religion as well as many other topics.

item.title: Episode 159 Darren LaMontagne
item.description: Tonight we talked with Darren LaMontagne, author of "The Pearly Gates". While talking with Darren about his book, his beliefs of reincarnation also was talked about. We also talked briefly about his next book that he is working on. So for a sneak peak about that, be sure to turn in.

item.title: Episode 158 Chris Dedman
item.description: We had a great time with Chris Dedman. Chris has been a paranormal investigator for over 15 years and the host of Para Talk on Ali-FM. We talk just about everything you can think of in the paranormal.

item.itunes:summary: We had a great time with Chris Dedman. Chris has been a paranormal investigator for over 15 years and the host of Para Talk on Ali-FM. We talk just about everything you can think of in the paranormal.

item.title: Episode 157 Dave Galvan
item.description: Paranormal League of America is an exciting organization that may look new, however it's vast years of experience can not be denied, making it the perfect group for an investigation into your haunting.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Paranormal League of America is an exciting organization that may look new, however it's vast years of experience can not be denied, making it the perfect group for an investigation into your haunting.

item.title: Episode 156 Sandman
item.description: Sandman of Society of the D.E.A.D. joined the CPR Crew and talked about the upcoming Titanic Adventure to occur on the 98th anniversary of it's demise. Listen to find out all of the details of this trip. We also talked about many of the places that he and his team have investigated.

item.title: Episode 155 Michelle Belanger
item.description: Tonight we spoke with Author, TV Personality and Psychic Vampire, Michelle Belanger. We spoke with her about her role on the popular Paranormal show Paranormal State and her life within the Vampire community. Very interesting show that you won't want to miss.

item.description: Tonight Kris and Mike were joined by two other show hosts from the All Souls Paranormal Radio Network for a mini rountable discussion. Gregg Cable of Midwest ParaTalk and Big Dog of M.A.P.S Radio discussed many of the popular paranormal topics. This was a great show with great discussions.

item.title: Episode 153 Ron Boles
item.description: Ron Boles of BFRO was the guest tonight. Anything and everything Big Foot was discussed. Ron was asked how to tell the difference between male and female Squatch. There was also an audio of Big Foot played.

item.description: We had a great time talking with these two ladies. They were very knowledgeable of the paranormal. We talked about everything from investigations, types of equipment used in the field and types of hauntings.

item.itunes:summary: We had a great time talking with these two ladies. They were very knowledgeable of the paranormal. We talked about everything from investigations, types of equipment used in the field and types of hauntings.

item.description: Big Foot, Yes, NO, Maybe. Big Foot Historian Jeff Hilling discusses this as well at the 1967 Paterson Film.

item.title: Episode 150 Brian Klein
item.description: We talked with Brian in depth about his upcoming Ohio ParaCon Event to be held in August. We also talked about investigating, Moundsville, Prospect Place and Point Pleasant, among other places.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: We talked with Brian in depth about his upcoming Ohio ParaCon Event to be held in August. We also talked about investigating, Moundsville, Prospect Place and Point Pleasant, among other places.

item.title: Episode 149 Rochelle Sparrow and Cortney Kane
item.description: They are back again. The Dynamic Duo Team of Rochelle Sparrow and Courtney Kane. So if you have missed them before you don't want to miss them again. These two are amazing and everyone that got readings were more than pleased with the results.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: They are back again. The Dynamic Duo Team of Rochelle Sparrow and Courtney Kane. So if you have missed them before you don't want to miss them again. These two are amazing and everyone that got readings were more than pleased with the results.

item.title: Episode 148 Wanda Lou Willis
item.description: Wanda Lou Willis is a folklore historian who specializes in Hoosier folktales and historic research. She is the author of Haunted Hoosier Trails and More Haunted Hoosier Trails and soon to be published Ghosthunting Indiana: America's Haunted Roadtrip. She is a former features writer for the Indianapolis Star’s "Seniority Counts" section and contributor to the SouthernIN on-line magazine and the Suite 101 - Folklore site. Currently she writes for Country Roads: Southeastern Indiana's Lifestyle Magazine.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Wanda Lou Willis is a folklore historian who specializes in Hoosier folktales and historic research. She is the author of Haunted Hoosier Trails and More Haunted Hoosier Trails and soon to be published Ghosthunting Indiana: America's Haunted Roadtrip. She is a former features writer for the Indianapolis Star’s "Seniority Counts" section and contributor to the SouthernIN on-line magazine and the Suite 101 - Folklore site. Currently she writes for Country Roads: Southeastern Indiana's Lifestyle Magazine.

item.title: Episode 147 Soul Smack
item.description: Since the release of Soul Smack Production's documentary film Your Worst Nightmare: Supernatural Assault, Producers Paul Taitt and Andrew Barnes have gained worldwide attention as leading authorities on the subject of sleep paralysis and have appeared in numerous radio talk shows and been invited on national television to help explain this scary but normal human experience.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary: Since the release of Soul Smack Production's documentary film Your Worst Nightmare: Supernatural Assault, Producers Paul Taitt and Andrew Barnes have gained worldwide attention as leading authorities on the subject of sleep paralysis and have appeared in numerous radio talk shows and been invited on national television to help explain this scary but normal human experience.

item.title: Episode 146 Rob Conover
item.description:
Rob Conover is an internationally known paranormal investigator and psychic who has appeared on numerous television programs and radio shows throughout the world; not bad for a guy who started out as a skeptic.
The reason Rob has generated so much attention is that he has a unique ability to communicate with spirits as if they were living, breathing people in the room with him.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Rob Conover is an internationally known paranormal investigator and psychic who has appeared on numerous television programs and radio shows throughout the world; not bad for a guy who started out as a skeptic.
The reason Rob has generated so much attention is that he has a unique ability to communicate with spirits as if they were living, breathing people in the room with him.

item.title: Episode 145 Dan T Hall
item.description:
Dan T. Hall’s paranormal journey begun following strange happenings on his film set on location at the old mental institution in Indianapolis.
Now, utilizing psychics, a demonologist and professional ghost trackers, Hall searches for answers in reputedly haunted locations. He relies on what he captures on film, audio equipment and personal experiences.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Dan T. Hall’s paranormal journey begun following strange happenings on his film set on location at the old mental institution in Indianapolis.
Now, utilizing psychics, a demonologist and professional ghost trackers, Hall searches for answers in reputedly haunted locations. He relies on what he captures on film, audio equipment and personal experiences.

item.title: Live at Phenomecon with Keith Age
item.description:
Join us this week as we replay the live show we had with guest Keith Age. This show was done in from of a live audience at the Crump Theater during the Indiana Phenomecon. So join Kris, Mike and Sheila this Sunday for a re-cap and then the pre-recorded show.
There were some audio difficulties in the beginning but the replay part was perfect.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Join us this week as we replay the live show we had with guest Keith Age. This show was done in from of a live audience at the Crump Theater during the Indiana Phenomecon. So join Kris, Mike and Sheila this Sunday for a re-cap and then the pre-recorded show.
There were some audio difficulties in the beginning but the replay part was perfect.

item.title: A Haunting in Georgia: The Veil – Heidi Wyrick’s Story
item.description:
I am sure many of you have seen "A Haunting in Georgia" on the Discovery Channel or maybe you know it as the story about the little girl and Mr.Gordy. Tonight we talked with Joyce Cathey (author of The Veil-The Heidi Wyrick Story) Heidi Wyrick (subject of the book) and Lisa Wyrick (Heidi’s mother).
Also do not forget if you have not had the chance to see "A Haunting in Georgia" it will be on the Discovery Channel on Oct. 31st at 1 pm EST.
item.dc:creator: Crossroads Paranormal Radio
item.itunes:summary:
I am sure many of you have seen "A Haunting in Georgia" on the Discovery Channel or maybe you know it as the story about the little girl and Mr.Gordy. Tonight we talked with Joyce Cathey (author of The Veil-The Heidi Wyrick Story) Heidi Wyrick (subject of the book) and Lisa Wyrick (Heidi’s mother).
Also do not forget if you have not had the chance to see "A Haunting in Georgia" it will be on the Discovery Channel on Oct. 31st at 1 pm EST.
